synopsis.text:
Sera, Eu, and the rest of the gang find themselves in a series of amusing escapades in this special OVA episode of Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? In the first of three stories, Haruna discovers a deserted festival and rallies everyone to create their own lively event, complete with a contest featuring Sera and Eu as prizes. Next, Ayumu is entrusted with a secret ninja recipe by Sera, but when Haruna gets her hands on it, Ayumu must find a way to retrieve it. Finally, the school hosts a nursery rhyme competition, with a coveted fountain pen as the prize.

As an added bonus, this OVA episode also includes an unaired 11th episode, originally bundled with the sixth volume of the manga. In this episode, Ayumu and the gang participate in a flea market, where Haruna and Orito compete to see who can earn the most money. Despite Haruna's initial struggles, the group bands together to help her. But when Ayumu accidentally drinks a potion that turns him invisible, he must navigate the school during a physical exam to find a missing pendant for Haruna.

With its signature blend of humor, fan service, and supernatural hijinks, this special OVA episode of Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? is sure to delight fans of the series. From festivals and flea markets to secret recipes and invisibility potions, there's never a dull moment with Ayumu and his friends.
